title: Chosen Survivors (1974 - USA) [multi subs] nuclear action
description:
Chosen Survivors (1974 - USA, Mexico)

Action / Adventure / Drama
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0071318/


This speculative horror film details the tribulations endured by a specially selected test group of 11 people who are informed that they will be the only occupants of a nuclear fallout shelter built half a mile below the Earth's surface. Chosen by project coordinator Peter Macomber as a fair cross-section of humanity, the group includes a politician, a businessman, an athlete and an author. As it turns out, the "survivors" are unwitting participants in a psychological experiment. To make matters worse, someone has left a vent open, releasing thousands of ravenous vampire bats.


Video: MPEG4 Video (H264), 718x464, 23.976 fps, 1547 Kbps, 01h38m53s
Audio: Dolby AC3, 48000 Hz, stereo, 192 kbps

DVDRip, English audio

Optional subtitles Bosnian, Croatian, English, French, Spanish
